MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.55am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.22AM on 3rd February 2021.
